mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ATTENDANCE (ATTENDANCE_NO, EMP_NO, ATTENDANCE_DATE) VALUES (SEQ_ATTENDANCE.NEXTVAL, #{empNo}, #{attendanceDate})
mapper.update: UPDATE ATTENDANCE SET CLOCK_OUT_TIME = #{clockOutTime}, ATT_STATUS = 'LEAVE' WHERE EMP_NO = #{empNo} AND TRUNC(ATTENDANCE_DATE) = TRUNC(SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ATTENDANCE WHERE EMP_NO = #{empNo} AND TRUNC(ATTENDANCE_DATE) BETWEEN TRUNC(#{startDate}) AND TRUNC(#{endDate}) ORDER BY ATTENDANCE_DATE
